segments.text: When you were in school , what were your favorite subjects ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I enjoyed everything , as long as I was learning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Still , you must have had some subjects you enjoyed more than others .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I did like Spanish and Music . But I don't remember much Spanish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too bad . We could really use someone who is bilingual .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you hire me , I'll start studying Spanish again .
segments.speaker: S2
